mean_cn: n. 官僚主义；政府机构
mean_en: the system of official rules and ways of doing things that a government or an organization has, especially when these seem to be too complicated
sentence: The bureaucracy always makes people go through unnecessary procedures.
sentence_trans: 官僚主义总是让人们走一些不必要的程序。
word_etyma: bureau政府机构 + cracy统治 → bureaucracy官僚政治
